D. COMMUNITY INVOLVEMENT AND PARTICIPATION IN THE INSTITUTION’S ACTIVITIES
IMPLEMENTATION
I.1. The College/Academic
Unit is committed to the
service and development of
the community; and
I.1.1 initiates and
maintains community
development projects

The Campus Extension Services Unit submits
proposals for approval and
funding thru channels every
start of a semester

BSOA just started to commence
this year. So, the impact on the
client will still yet to be
documented.
